name: Icebeargs are coming!
description:
Icebearg protection forces needs to prevent polar bears riding icebergs to reach Iceland!  

How? 

Pilot your helicopter's hook and try to grab the bears from the icebergs and send them back to Greenland! But note: Polar bears reaaaally like fish.

Disclaimer: This game is not really finished, there is no end screen nor instructions. I simply had no time to make those and it will be updated at a later date

Keys:
Shift/Ctrl to ascend/descend
WS - pitch
AD - roll
QE - yaw
X - to release the hook
